p: A dataset of mean monthly temperatures under current and future climate conditions was prepared using the WorldClim dataset ( http://www.worldclim.org). For the current MB index, the 30-year mean monthly temperatures between 1960 and 1990 were used, while for future MB indices, a set of 20-year mean monthly temperatures between 2041 and 2060 (hereafter, the 2050s) and 2061 and 2080 (hereafter, the 2070s) was determined by averaging the minimum and maximum temperatures provided by WorldClim.
